languages.text: "Слишком долго перечислять — да и зачем? Я не желаю тратить дыхание на этот разговор".
"It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."
languages.original_text: "Слишком долго перечислять — да и зачем? Я не желаю тратить дыхание на этот разговор".

traits.locale_text: "It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."
"It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."
"It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."
"It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."

languages.text: “若要把你的过错全都指出来，恐怕花上很久。而且，我凭什么要这么做？我已经不打算继续浪费口舌了。”
languages.original_text: "It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."

traits.locale_text: “若要把你的过错全都指出来，恐怕花上很久。而且，我凭什么要这么做？我已经不打算继续浪费口舌了。”

languages.text: 「語ると長くなる―時間を割く必要はないだろう？この会話で息を無駄に吐きたくはない」
languages.original_text: "It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."

traits.locale_text: 「語ると長くなる―時間を割く必要はないだろう？この会話で息を無駄に吐きたくはない」

languages.text: «Tardaría demasiado en enumerarlo todo. ¿Y por qué debería hacerlo? No tengo ningún deseo de malgastar saliva con esta conversación».
languages.original_text: "It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."

traits.locale_text: «Tardaría demasiado en enumerarlo todo. ¿Y por qué debería hacerlo? No tengo ningún deseo de malgastar saliva con esta conversación».

languages.text: « Ce serait trop long à expliquer... et rien ne m'oblige à le faire. Je n'ai aucune envie de gaspiller ma salive pour si peu. »
languages.original_text: "It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait trop long à expliquer... et rien ne m'oblige à le faire. Je n'ai aucune envie de gaspiller ma salive pour si peu. »

languages.text: "Es würde zu lange dauern, alles aufzuzählen – und warum sollte ich? Ich habe keine Lust, meinen Atem für dieses Gespräch zu verschwenden."
languages.original_text: "It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Es würde zu lange dauern, alles aufzuzählen – und warum sollte ich? Ich habe keine Lust, meinen Atem für dieses Gespräch zu verschwenden."

languages.text: "Hepsini baştan saymak çok zaman alır. Hem neden yapayım ki? Konuşarak nefesimi boşa harcamaya niyetim yok."
languages.original_text: "It would take too long to recount — and why should I? I have no desire to waste my breath on this conversation."

traits.locale_text: "Hepsini baştan saymak çok zaman alır. Hem neden yapayım ki? Bu konuşmada nefesimi boşa harcamaya niyetim yok."
